thread.title: Hot topic – Iran: Middle East meets west...again
thread.title_full: Hot topic – Iran: Middle East meets west...again

author: Stuart Radnedge|published in gasworld magazine
title: Hot topic – Iran: Middle East meets west...again
text:
Hot topic – Iran: Middle East meets west...again 28 Sep 2015 | By Stuart Radnedge , published in gasworld magazine 
Part 1. Iran could soon be open for trade with global markets as sanctions, first imposed 36 years ago, prohibiting the west from trading with the country look set to be dissolved. Here, gasworld’s focus on Iran looks at what potential might be unlocked. Get instant access to must-read content from top industry writers!
